topic.title: Building your own macro (Mingle Onsite only)

section.title: Getting started with the Macro Development Toolkit
section.p: These instructions are for building a custom macro in Mingle using the Macro Development Toolkit (available for Mingle Onsite only). The toolkit is available as a gem and is available either with your Mingle download (in the <MINGLE_HOME>/tools directory where <MINGLE HOME> is the directory where Mingle is installed) or via the web on GitHub.
